Summary: reddish orange fireball with teardrop shape headed south to north approx 10:03 central
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Conway
There were no other sightings in Conway on or around July 7th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsstanding on porch in conway ar, facing north, saying goodbye to friends leaving the house. happened to look up and saw a reddish orange fireball with teardrop shape and tail that was headed south to north approx 10:03 or 4 pm central. immediately asked others to look at it and they saw same...i thought maybe fireworks? but it was way too high and lasted way too long. thought maybe flare, but was moving too fast to north...it got smaller and lost its tail as it got further north until it disappeared in the night sky like a star having appeared to never lose altitude or speed. came inside immediately and came here...
